Meet Vocha: Your Voice, Your Message!

Voice-type your messages for ChatGPT with the Vocha extension. This tool adds a microphone button to the message field which you can activate easily with the SPACE shortcut or a click.

‚Ä¢ Clean Design: Its minimalistic design blends perfectly with the ChatGPT interface, providing you a smooth user experience.
‚Ä¢ Easy to Use: Vocha requires minimal setup.

‚Ä¢ Multi-Language Support: If you communicate in multiple languages, Vocha supports easy switching between them. 
‚Ä¢ Editable Message Option: After your recording has stopped, you can choose to send, edit, or resume recording your message.
‚Ä¢ Support 30+ languages
